## StepApi.emit() method

Emits data to an output socket. If undefined, default output.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
emit(value: T, socket?: SocketName): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | The value to emit |
|  socket | [SocketName](./workflow.socketname.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The socket name to emit data to |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
